name: Eye of Gath
description:
After months of searching, the adventurer Athorn of Zar finally discovers the lost city of Urbaria, trapped in perpetual night.

The city was devastated by magic 300 years ago, but is said to contain the fabled Eye of Gath, a jewel of outstanding quality and great value.

Athorn heads inside...

A simple fantasy dungeon crawler.

Very unfinished.

A note about the Jam version: I really ran out of time, so there's not much to do yet. I think I was probably about an hour away from having a whole game, although it would still have been sparse, and hopelessly unbalanced.

It's written in Love2D, so I should be able to get Mac and Linux versions working at some point after the jam. Or maybe just release the .love file.
